I wish i was dead by daylight.
Get stabbed, get hooked, the last survivor leaves you for dead and jumps into hatch. Both you and the killer are salty. 11/10 would get hooked again.

The game can be glitchy.  Sometimes it won't start, sometimes space bar doesn't work for the shill checkpoints, and it always sucks waiting for a match, but I always have fun, which makes up for all the rest.

Dead by Daylight is a pretty fun game if you can manage not to get frustrated by some of it quirks. Its entertaining and rewards players who have spent time learning how each of the perks work. And by that I mean it can give you an advantage in matches if you can figure out what perks the killer/survivors have and what they do.

I hate the asylum map the one with the clown chapter and i want it deleted.

Fun and addictive asymmetrical multiplayer game. Simple in concept but with a surprisingly high skill cap. Once you get a handle on the chase mechanics, the game becomes less about hiding and seeking and more about efficiency and bluffing.

So this has become one of my favourite games to play, ever.

It has its problems, i wont lie. Its a little unbalanced (not too bad, but still there), theres a few bugs that still go unfixed here and there,  perks are very grindy to unlock and the community is more toxic than Chernobyl.

But with all that being said, if you have ever been a fan of horror, or enjoyed asymmetric multiplayer games, you will enjoy this. 

Also Im not gonna lie, the design team need a raise because some of the original killers in this game are amazingly designed. The plauge comes to mind.
